budgets.name: Name
budgets.confirmDelete: Are you sure you want to delete this budget?
budgets.emptyList: No budgets have been created yet. Create a new one below!

import.importInstead: Import an existing budget from YNAB 4 instead
import.shortDescription: Import an existing budget from YNAB 4
import.description: You can import your YNAB 4 budget here. This will create a new EZ budget with all your transactions, categories, and accounts from YNAB so that you can continue right where you left off. See here for instructions on where to find your YNAB data file.

accounts.confirmDelete: This action can't be undone. Consider archiving the account instead. Are you sure you want to delete this account?
accounts.emptyList: No accounts found. Create a new one now!
accounts.name: Name
accounts.onBudgetExplanation: You can assign money from this account to your envelopes
accounts.offBudgetExplanation: Money in this account is tracked, but can not be assigned to envelopes

import.confirmCancel: Are you sure you want to cancel the unfinished import?
import.description: Import a list of transactions, for example a downloaded bank statement. You will be able to review the transactions before they are saved. Uploads are parsed in your browser, powered by YNAP, and by Envelope Zero. A list of all currently supported banks can be found here.
import.duplicateDetected: This is a duplicate of an existing transaction
import.alreadyConverted: This file has already been parsed. Please upload the CSV file from your bank.
import.noParser: This file can not be parsed. Please check if your bank is on the list of supported formats linked below.
import.unfinishedImportInProgress: You have an unfinished transaction import in progress.
import.youCanCloseAndResume: You can safely close this page and come back later to finish the import. All changes are saved in your browser.

transactions.emptyList: No transactions found. Create a new one now!
transactions.unlockBeforeEditingNote: This transaction has been reconciled and is therefore locked. If you want to edit it, you need to unlock it, which will also mark it as unreconciled again.
transactions.unlockBeforeEditingError: This transaction has been reconciled and needs to be unlocked before updating it.
transactions.confirmDelete: Are you sure you want to delete this transaction?
transactions.availableFromExplanation:
The month in which this income should be made available to budget.
 Use this setting to prevent allocating funds that are not yet available.

For example, if your salary is paid at the end of the month, you might want to set this to the following month.
transactions.availableFromMonthField: This field is fixed to the first of the month since the availability is always for a whole month. Your browser does not support a month input field, therefore Envelope Zero displays a date input.

envelopes.name: Name
envelopes.confirmDelete: This action can't be undone. Consider archiving the envelope instead. Are you sure you want to delete this envelope?
envelopes.emptyList: No envelopes found. Create a new one now!

categories.name: Name
categories.confirmDelete: This action can't be undone. Consider archiving the category instead. Are you sure you want to delete this category?

dashboard.quickAllocationExplanation: Automatically allocate funds to envelopes that currently don't have an allocation for this month

matchRules.description: With match rules, you can automatically assign source and destination accounts when importing transactions.
matchRules.emptyList: No match rules found. Create a new one now!
matchRules.help:
Match rules can automatically set the source and destination accounts for imported transactions. When transactions are imported, both the parsed source and destination account name are matched against these rules.

Matching is case sensitive and you can use the "*" character as a wildcard that matches anything.

Match rules are checked in the order they are shown here. Only the first matching rule is applied. Drag them in the order you want!

When done, save your changes. If you accidentally deleted a rule, just reload the page without saving.
matchRules.invalid: The rule with match "{{match}}" and account "{{account}}" is invalid. Both match and account need to be set.
